name: Solarblade
description:
Solarblade is an adventure game featuring a boy named Sol, who ends up thrown into a long adventure when the kingdom of Helicalia needs his help.
Solarblade plays much like 3D Zelda games, so, you should feel very familiar if you've played them.

Do you like this game? If so you can:
